## Overview

This module ensures all participants have the necessary software and tools installed for the viral genomics workshop. Complete this setup **before** the workshop begins to maximize hands-on learning time.

By the end of this module, you will have:

- ‚úÖ Verified your computing environment

## Troubleshooting

**Common Issues:**
- Administrative privileges required
- Antivirus software blocking installations
- Network restrictions in institutional environments
- Version compatibility problems

**Getting Help:**
- Check our [troubleshooting guide](troubleshooting.qmd)
- Post in workshop Slack channel
- Email technical support: `tech.support@workshop.org`
- Arrive early on Day 1 for setup assistance
